line_1: Where all, except the Love, is low and flat.
line_2: With these you aim but at good-natur'd Chat,

line_1: Then turned him to his cot with visage flat,
line_2: Where honest Lightfoot on the threshold sat.

line_1: Too courteous, perhaps, or obligingly flat;
line_2: His very worst foe can't accuse him of that.
A silver button spoils your hat.
